results.title: Association of vitamin B12 deficiency in people with type 2 diabetes on metformin and without metformin: a multicenter study, Karachi, Pakistan
results.text_hl: On contrary, @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000309 @@@B12 insufficiency@@@ was significantly higher in non-@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users.

results.text_hl: Recent studies have reported that @CHEMICAL_Artesunate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077332 @@@artesunate@@@ (ART) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@GENE_MET @GENE_24553 @@@Met@@@) improve @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000309 @@@salivary gland (SG) hypofunction@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ @DISEASE_Sjogren's_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012859 @@@Sjogren's syndrome@@@.

results.title: Prevalence of Vitamin B12 Deficiency in Patients with Type II Diabetes Mellitus on Metformin: A Study from Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
results.text_hl: Clinicians should, therefore, recognize this significant element and should screen @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetics@@@ who are on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment for any @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000309 @@@B12 insufficiency@@@, which may be hidden, especially @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ coming with @DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurologic symptoms@@@.

results.title: Short-term combined treatment with exenatide and metformin is superior to glimepiride combined metformin in improvement of serum testosterone levels in type 2 diabetic patients with obesity.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, short-term combined treatment with @CHEMICAL_Exenatide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077270 @@@EXE@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ is superior to @CHEMICAL_glimepiride @CHEMICAL_MESH:C057619 @@@GLI@@@ combined @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ treatment in the improvement of serum @CHEMICAL_Testosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013739 @@@TT@@@ levels, which could lead to an improvement of @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000309 @@@sexual hypofunction@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D

results.title: mTORC1 inhibitors rapamycin and metformin affect cardiovascular markers differentially in ZDF rats.
results.text_hl: Here, we investigated the differential effects of @CHEMICAL_Sirolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020123 @@@rapamycin@@@ (1.2 mg/kg per day delivered subcutaneously for 6 weeks) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (300 mg/kg per day delivered orally for 11 weeks) treatments on male @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Zucker diabetic fatty@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@ZDF@@@) @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ that mimic the cardiorenal pathology of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ and progress to @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000309 @@@insulin insufficiency@@@.

results.title: Sulphonylurea and hypothyroidism in Nigerian diabetic subjects.
results.text_hl: Whilst abnormal tests suggestive of @<m>DISEASE_Adrenal_Insufficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000309 @@@thyroidal hypofunctional@@@ state were commoner in the group on @CHEMICAL_Chlorpropamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002747 @@@chlorpropamide@@@ alone, and in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, these were unrelated to the duration of treatment.
